ctu_text: The objective is to ensure that talented students from minority backgrounds have access to quality education and are not deterred by financial barriers. By offering scholarships based on both merit and means, the scheme intends to empower minority students to fulfill their academic potential and contribute positively to society. Additionally, it seeks to promote inclusivity and diversity in higher education by supporting students from marginalized communities.
